metadata.title: commons-configuration: StackOverflowError calling ListDelimiterHandler.flatten(Object, int) with a cyclical object tree (low)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A vulnerability was found in Apache Commons-Configuration2, where a Stack Overflow Error occurs when calling ListDelimiterHandler.flatten(Object, int) with a cyclical object tree. This issue could allow an attacker to trigger an out-of-bounds write that could lead to memory corruption or cause a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
